abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - green - yarn needle - scissors final size - coaster diameter of 8 cm technical notes *the slime is worked in one piece *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains and slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern slime green round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts *for round 4 you will be making ten drips round 4 drip 1 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 3 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 7 chs skip a st make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts 12 sts drip 2 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 3 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 chs skip a st make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts 7 sts drip 3 chain 8 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 3 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 4 chs skip a st make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts 9 sts drip 4 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 3 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in the next chain skip a st make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 5 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 3 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 chs skip a st make 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 sts 7 sts drip 6 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook
